metadata.title: FIECON — International Corporate Law & Company Formation Advisory
metadata.description: FIECON Germany Co. KG — International advisory for corporate law, company formations, financial administration and construction finance. Offices in Hamburg, Belgrade, Texas, Montenegro and Vanuatu.
metadata.keywords: corporate law, international company formation, business consulting Hamburg, company formation Serbia, company formation USA Texas, financial administration, construction finance, yacht finance, FIECON Consulting, international advisory

hero.headline: Your Business. Internationally Advised.
hero.subtitle: Corporate law and international company formations — personal guidance in Hamburg, Belgrade, Texas, Montenegro and Vanuatu.

about.headline: Vision Meets Diligence
about.text_1: FIECON stands for international advisory with a personal commitment. Our core expertise lies in corporate law and international company formations — fields where experience, precision and cultural understanding make all the difference.
about.text_2: From Hamburg, Belgrade, Texas, Montenegro and Vanuatu, we guide businesses across borders. We also advise on financial administration, construction finance and yacht construction finance — always with the ambition to represent your interests as if they were our own.
about.quote: We advise as if it were our own company at stake.

services.headline: Our Expertise
services.subtitle: Four areas of competence — one commitment: getting your international ventures right.

consulting.title: Corporate Law & Company Formations
consulting.description: Our core practice: we advise on the formation, structuring and governance of companies across international jurisdictions. From initial concept to legally sound implementation, we stand by your side.

finance.title: Financial Administration
finance.description: Clarity builds trust: we take charge of your corporate financial administration and create the transparent structures that enable sustainable growth.

construction.title: Construction Finance
construction.description: Construction projects demand financial reliability. We structure and oversee the financing of your building ventures — from initial calculation to completion.

yacht.title: Yacht Construction Finance
yacht.description: A distinctive segment deserves distinctive care. We advise on the financing of yacht construction projects — discreetly, personally and with a genuine understanding of the industry's standards.

corporate_law.title: Corporate Law Expertise
corporate_law.lead: Corporate law expert Peter Fiegler and his team

items.1: Design and safeguarding of management, liability and compliance
items.2: Support with structural changes and cross-border matters

transparency.title: Transparency Register
transparency.lead: Review of all reporting obligations for beneficial owners

items.0: Alignment of German requirements with foreign corporate structures
items.1: Ensuring consistent, timely and audit-proof filings
items.2: Regular review and updates of register entries

expertise.title: International Expertise
expertise.description: Deep understanding of legal systems, business cultures and regulatory nuances across Europe, the USA and Southeast Europe.

personal.title: Personal Closeness
personal.description: With us, you are never just a file number. We take the time to understand your goals and develop strategies that truly fit your situation.

trust.title: Partnership on Equal Terms
trust.description: We think long-term. Transparency, integrity and measurable results are not just values to us — they are commitments.

offices.headline: Close to Your Markets
offices.subtitle: Five locations, one promise — personal advisory with international reach.

contact.headline: Let's talk
contact.subtitle: Whether an initial question or a concrete project — we take the time for you.

dialog.title: Send Message
dialog.panel_subtitle: We look forward to your inquiry and will get back to you promptly.

footer.description: FIECON Germany Co. KG — International advisory for corporate law, company formations and beyond. Personal. Precise. Partnered.
footer.copyright: © {year} FIECON Germany Co. KG. All rights reserved.

team.cta_subline: Whether an initial question or a concrete project — we take the time for you.

team_peter_fiegler.meta_title: Peter Fiegler — Founder & Corporate Law Expert
team_peter_fiegler.meta_description: Peter Fiegler, founder of FIECON. Extensive expertise in corporate law, international company formations and premium personal advisory.
team_peter_fiegler.hero_tagline: Corporate law and international company formations — with vision, precision and personal commitment.
team_peter_fiegler.bio_1: Peter Fiegler founded FIECON with the conviction that excellent corporate law advisory only succeeds when you fully adopt the client's perspective. His approach combines deep expertise with entrepreneurial acumen that extends far beyond the purely legal dimension.
team_peter_fiegler.bio_2: With offices in Hamburg, Belgrade, Texas, Montenegro and Vanuatu, he has built an international network that supports clients wherever their business ventures take them — whether founding a company in Southeast Europe, structuring a holding, or entering new markets.
team_peter_fiegler.bio_3: His philosophy is straightforward: every mandate deserves the same care he would devote to his own company. This commitment shapes every consultation, every structure and every recommendation.
team_peter_fiegler.quote: We advise as if it were our own company at stake.
team_peter_fiegler.competency_1_description: Advisory on the formation, structuring and governance of companies — nationally and internationally. From GmbH to cross-border holdings.
team_peter_fiegler.competency_2_description: Comprehensive support for company formations in Germany, Serbia, the USA and further jurisdictions. Legally sound and efficient.
team_peter_fiegler.competency_3_description: Transparent financial structures, reporting obligations and transparency registers — for corporate governance that builds trust.
team_peter_fiegler.competency_4_description: Long-term strategies for corporate growth, participation structures and international expansion — personal and partnership-oriented.

team_rene_marquard.meta_title: René Marquard — Wealth Management & Precious Metal Investments
team_rene_marquard.meta_description: René Marquard, specialist in wealth management and precious metal investments at FIECON. Personal asset advisory with foresight and discretion.
team_rene_marquard.hero_tagline: Wealth management and precious metal investments — with experience, discretion and personal commitment.
team_rene_marquard.bio_1: René Marquard brings extensive expertise in wealth management and human resources consulting. As a specialist in precious metal investments, he combines deep market knowledge with a keen understanding of each client's individual needs.
team_rene_marquard.bio_2: Based in Hamburg, he advises private individuals and businesses seeking to preserve their wealth sustainably and develop it strategically. His approach blends classical asset management with specialised investment strategies in the precious metals sector.
team_rene_marquard.bio_3: Discretion, personal closeness and a long-term perspective are not mere buzzwords for him — they are the foundation of every advisory engagement. Every mandate receives the same level of care, regardless of its size.
team_rene_marquard.quote: Preserving wealth means acting with foresight — built on trust and vision.
team_rene_marquard.competency_1_description: Holistic asset management for private individuals and businesses — from analysis and strategy to ongoing portfolio stewardship.
team_rene_marquard.competency_2_description: Specialised advisory on investments in gold, silver and other precious metals — as instruments of wealth preservation and diversification.
team_rene_marquard.competency_3_description: Expertise in human resources and executive consulting — for filling key positions and building high-performing teams.
team_rene_marquard.competency_4_description: Development of individual investment strategies that balance security and growth — personal, long-term and transparent.

team_andre_zimmermann.meta_description: Andre Zimmermann, Technology and Web Development at FIECON. Over 20 years of experience in software development, AI-driven programming and digital infrastructure.
team_andre_zimmermann.hero_tagline: Technology and web development — with over 20 years of experience and the strategic use of AI to deliver projects at the highest professional standard.
team_andre_zimmermann.bio_1: Andre Zimmermann is responsible for FIECON's technological direction and web development. As a certified application developer, he combines deep technical expertise with the targeted use of artificial intelligence — turning ambitious projects into reality at the highest professional standard.
team_andre_zimmermann.bio_2: With over 20 years of professional experience in software development and a deep understanding of AI-driven programming, he brings a unique profile: he leverages cutting-edge AI technologies as a strategic tool to accelerate development and deliver results at maximum professional quality.
team_andre_zimmermann.bio_3: His principle: technology should never be an end in itself, but a tool — precise, reliable and tailored to the needs of the business. With AI as a partner, every vision becomes a result that truly convinces.
team_andre_zimmermann.quote: Great technology is invisible — it simply works.
team_andre_zimmermann.competency_1_description: Conception and development of modern web applications — from user interface to server architecture. Performant, secure and scalable.
team_andre_zimmermann.competency_2_description: Design of robust system architectures that grow with the business. From technology selection to long-term maintainability.
team_andre_zimmermann.competency_3_description: Leadership and coordination of development teams and technical projects — with clear processes, agile methodologies and measurable outcomes.
team_andre_zimmermann.competency_4_description: Building and optimising digital infrastructure for businesses — from server administration to the integration of modern cloud solutions.

impressum.title: Legal Notice
impressum.responsible_title: Responsible for content according to § 55 para. 2 RStV
impressum.disclaimer_content_text: The contents of our pages were created with the greatest care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness or topicality of the content. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 para. 1 TMG under general law. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, we as a service provider are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
impressum.disclaimer_links_text: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for this third-party content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognisable at the time of linking.
impressum.copyright_text: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.
datenschutz.section_1_text: The responsible entity for data processing on this website is:
datenschutz.section_2_title: 2. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
datenschutz.section_2_text: When visiting our website, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your internet service provider, your IP address and similar details. This is exclusively information that does not allow any conclusions about your person.
datenschutz.section_2_legal_basis: The legal basis for data processing is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. Our legitimate interest lies in ensuring the trouble-free operation of our website.
datenschutz.section_2_retention: Server log files are automatically deleted after 14 days.
datenschutz.section_3_text: If you contact us by email or via the contact form, your details including the contact data you provide will be stored for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. We will not share this data without your consent.
datenschutz.section_3_legal_basis: The legal basis for processing the data is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (pre-contractual measures) or Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in processing your inquiry).
datenschutz.section_3_retention: Data transmitted in the course of contacting us will be deleted as soon as your inquiry has been conclusively processed and no statutory retention obligations apply.
datenschutz.section_4_text: For sending emails via our contact form, we use an SMTP mail server. The data you enter (name, email address, subject, message) is transmitted to our email provider, who delivers the email on our behalf.
datenschutz.section_5_text_1: You have the following rights with regard to your personal data:
datenschutz.section_5_rights_3: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
datenschutz.section_5_rights_5: Right to object to processing (Art. 21 GDPR)
datenschutz.section_5_text_2: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority about the processing of your personal data by us.
datenschutz.section_6_text: Our website uses a functional cookie (NEXT_LOCALE) to store your language preference. This cookie is technically necessary and does not require consent under § 25 para. 2 TDDDG. No tracking or analytics cookies are used.
datenschutz.section_7_text: This privacy policy is currently valid. Due to the further development of our website or due to changed legal or regulatory requirements, it may become necessary to amend this privacy policy.

schema.description: FIECON Germany Co. KG — International advisory for corporate law, company formations, financial administration and construction finance. Offices in Hamburg, Belgrade, Texas, Montenegro and Vanuatu.
